AboutSection.title: about us
AboutSection.subtitle: One place that combines luxury and high-end hospitality
AboutSection.description: Durra Taibah is not just a collection of hotels, but an experience that combines authentic Arabic traditions with the highest standards of modern hospitality. We strive to provide an unforgettable experience for our guests in every stay.

registerNow.allHealthEvents: All health events in one platform

successStory.successStoryDescription: We work with our partners as one team to organize health events in the best possible way. We care about the smallest details to make every scientific event an unforgettable mark.
successStory.conferenceDescription: There is a well-established fact that the content of a page will distract the reader from focusing on the external appearance of the text or the way paragraphs are arranged on the page they are reading. Therefore, a method is used.
